title: Get Creative Features Request
description: Request payload for the get_creative_features task. Submits a creative manifest for evaluation by a governance agent, which analyzes the creative and returns scored feature values (brand safety, content categorization, quality metrics, etc.).

creative_manifest.description: The creative manifest to evaluate. Contains format_id and assets.

feature_ids.description: Optional filter to specific features. If omitted, returns all available features.

account.description: Account for billing this evaluation. Required when the governance agent charges per evaluation.
